message: This is a rare opportunity to acquire a premium product, worth $1200000 to many. I'm willing to part with it for the low price of $1000000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal anywhere else. What do you say? Will you take advantage of this incredible offer?
I'm not going to fall for the emotional appeal. I need more information about the product before making a decision.

What do you say? Will you take a chance on this incredible opportunity?
